sentences.en: All parts are machined from top grade, high tensile aluminium.
sentences.cn: 所有零件都是用顶级高强度铝加工而成。

sentences.en: All the materials used were of the highest grade.
sentences.cn: 使用的材料全是优质品。

sentences.en: All the parks are regularly checked and graded by tourist board inspectors.
sentences.cn: 所有公园都由旅游协会的检查员进行定期检查和评级。

sentences.en: He got a grade A in maths.
sentences.cn: 他数学得了个A。

sentences.en: He is a bit let down by the low grade he got.
sentences.cn: 这次成绩不好,他有点气馁.

sentences.en: He merits a grade of B on his composition.
sentences.cn: 他的作文分数应该得B.

sentences.en: I flunked math in second grade.
sentences.cn: 我二年级时数学不及格。

sentences.en: I was a naval officer, lieutenant junior grade.
sentences.cn: 我是一名海军中尉军官。

sentences.en: industrial grade diamonds
sentences.cn: 工业等级钻石

sentences.en: It was actually used for enriching uranium to weapons-grade levels.
sentences.cn: 实际上，它是用来将铀浓缩以制造武器。

sentences.en: Michael Grade's persuasive powers overcame their objections.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔·格雷德能言善辩，驳倒了他们的反对意见。

sentences.en: Mr White teaches first grade in south Georgia.
sentences.cn: 怀特先生在佐治亚州南部教一年级。

sentences.en: My son is a quick student and always has high grade.
sentences.cn: 我儿子是个聪明的学生,总是得高分.

sentences.en: Pencils are graded according to softness.
sentences.cn: 铅笔按软硬度分级。

sentences.en: She tolerated the teasing, until the fourth grade.
sentences.cn: 她忍受着别人的嘲笑，一直忍到四年级。

sentences.en: Simply sand them down with a fine grade of sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 只要用细砂纸把它们打磨一下即可。

sentences.en: South Point College does not grade the students' work.
sentences.cn: 南点学院不对学生的作业评分。

sentences.en: The best grades of tea are expensive.
sentences.cn: 最上等的茶叶价格很贵。

sentences.en: The boy first showed promise as an athlete in grade school.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩在上小学的时候就初次显示出成为运动员的潜力。

sentences.en: the crossing at grade of two streets.
sentences.cn: 两条街的平面交叉路口。

sentences.en: Tim worked hard and got good grades.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆努力学习，取得了好成绩。

sentences.en: Use only clean, Grade A, perfect eggs.
sentences.cn: 只用表面干净、无磕碰的A级鸡蛋。

words.tran_cn: 累进的；分等级的；毕了业的；为毕业生设立的
（色彩、颜色、次序、音调等的）渐变；分等级；（各种状态、性质等的）分阶段渐变；元音交替
分级机；分类机；（美）（中小学的）…年级学生
分阶段；定等级；坡度缓和
毕业；毕业典礼；刻度，分度；分等级
定等级；减缓坡度（grade的现在分词形式）
使毕业；毕业（graduate的过去分词）；使…升级
使逐渐转化；使顺次排列
授予…学位；分等级；标上刻度

phrases.tran_cn: 年级水平；地坪；均夷面；适用年级

trans.tran_cn: 等级，职别，成绩等级，年级
trans.tran_en: a particular level of quality that a product, material etc has
to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is

trans.tran_cn: 属于…等级，缓缓地变化或发展
安排，依序排列，依等级排列，评估，评分
trans.tran_en: to say what level of a quality something has, or what standard it is
